column5: The ice fishing season is winding down in NW Ontario so I thought it was time to get caught up with a report of the second half of my season. Overall it was one of he best years on the ice for me.  I spent more time chasing lakers this year.  I'm the kind of fisherman who would rather catch 1 or 2 big fish then 20 or 50 panfish.  So lakers fit the bill and they're a good winter substitute for muskies too.  Of course I still love walleye and the late ice bite didn't disappoint.  Fishing in 25-30' for walleye during late ice you never know what you're going to catch.  Smallies, pike, trout, whitefish, burbot.  It's a fun time of year on the ice up here.  I'll let the pictures do the talking.  Enjoy!              This next guy isn't the longest trout I've caught but look at how thick it is!          Pretty fun to crack a PB through the ice. 20" smallmouth.             Double header trout with my buddy Colin.  We were both fishing for walleye with Lindy Darters so this was a real coincidence/bonus!
You are truly in lake trout heaven.  Awesome report.
Awesome fish!
Thanks for sharing
Awesome.  Some real quality fish.
I think I need to get them skis on next winter and do some travelling!!  Some great stuff there Ben.. How close are you to the lake so I can keep an eye on the plane while livin with ya??
Awesome fish Ben.My fav is that big Pike and that Fat Smallie.Thanks for sharing
Thanks guys!   Wayne, there's a spot for your plane down by the ice runway in town.  Nice and close so we can fly out everyday to a different lake!
That runway run by Allen.
If he's the guy at Slate Falls, then yes.  They keep a few planes on ski's on the ice down there and it's a busy float plane base in the summer.
Nice report Ben!!!  I'll see you in a few weeks for some spring fishing on Lac Seul!!!
you are a lucky guy...live the dream...or at least my dream....   some great fish there....  I wonder if Wayne would know I was hiding in the tail of the plane......
Can't get enough of those lakers too, huh?!?!  Wicked recap.  That first ling is HUGE.  Hope you have a great spring dude.  HD
Sweet fish.   Those planes aren't called tail draggers fer nothin'.
Awesome report!  Thanks for sharing and congrats on such a successful season.  Beauty fish!!!
WOW!!! Great season!!!
well i wasnt sure how you were going to top the first half of the season ...but im thinking you did it fairly well...  Good on ya Ben  Cheers
Wicked pics man! Love big lakers! I also need to head NW sometime soon! Looking forawrd to reading your spring/summer report!   TDunn
Wow Ben, you've got some tanks there!
Wow Ben, some amazing fish there. Incredible.
Great job Ben, I will see you in couple of weeks for the cats.
Nice fish. I'd love to get a ling like that.
Beautiful fish Ben. Great report
